description: They also want to avoid getting entangled in the intensifying US-China geopolitical conflict. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Singapore wins more investments from major chipmakers as they seek to de-risk supply chains
title_page: Singapore wins more investments from major chipmakers as they seek to de-risk supply chains | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE â€“ Singapore continues to assert its status as a global semiconductor production hub, with more chipmakers and related businesses moving in to set up new plants.
The total amount of investment flows may vary from one year to the next, but the trend is clear.
